Modules
=======

This application software is divided into ten modules. The following sections
correspond to the documentation of each module that defines the structure of the
aplication software called ``pyBIMstab``.

Each module contains the respective explanation of the classes and methods,
sometimes supported by bibliographic references. The atttributes and input 
parameters are described and followed by examples for showing the different
cases of application.

.. toctree::
   :numbered:
   :maxdepth: 10
   :caption: Contents

   astar
   bim
   polygon
   slices
   slipsurface
   slope
   slopestabl
   smoothcurve
   tools
   watertable
